tool_description:
Signatures. Made simple.
Getting documents signed has never been simpler. We've removed paper entirely from the process and built tools to facilitate document signing, tracking and management. Notifications keep you apprised of the signer's activity and our audit trail logs it. Once completed, signed documents are securely stored and accessible from the cloud so you can always get to your important documents.

Sharing is just as easy. With HelloSign you can share templates and signed documents with your team, other internal departments and even outside counsel, so everyone is on the same paperless page.
name: HelloSign
title: HelloSign

api_list.name: Get Reusable Form
api_list.description: Returns the ReusableForm specified by the id parameter.

required_parameters.name: reusable_form_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the ReusableForm to retrieve.

api_list.name: List Reusable Forms
api_list.description: Returns a list the ReusableForms that are accessible by you.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page number of the ReusableForm List to return. Defaults to 1.

api_list.name: Get signature request
api_list.description: Returns the status of the SignatureRequest specified by the signature_request_id parameter.

required_parameters.name: signature_request_id
required_parameters.description: The id of the SignatureRequest to retrieve.

api_list.name: Get team
api_list.description: Returns information about your Team as well as a list of its members. If you do not belong to a Team, a 404 error with an error_name of "not_found" will be returned.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-hellosign.p.rapidapi.com/team"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-hellosign.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get account
api_list.description: Returns the properties and settings of your Account.

api_list.name: List signature requests
api_list.description: Returns a list of SignatureRequests that you can access. This includes SignatureRequests you have sent as well as received, but not ones that you have been CCed on.
